TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GroupBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 控制項，這個控制項會在一組控制項周圍顯示框架 (Frame)，並且顯示選擇性 (Optional) 的標題。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的一組包含或不含標題的控制項周圍顯示框架。The displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption. 使用以邏輯方式群組在表單上控制項的集合。Use a to logically group a collection of controls on a form. 群組方塊是一個容器控制項，可用來定義控制項的群組。The group box is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls. 群組方塊的一般用途是要包含的邏輯群組控制項。The typical use for a group box is to contain a logical group of controls. 如果您有兩個群組方塊中，每個都包含數個選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕） 時，按鈕的每個群組會是每個群組的互斥，設定其中一個選項值。If you have two group boxes, each of which contain several option buttons (also known as radio buttons), each group of buttons is mutually exclusive, setting one option value per group. 您可以將控制項加入利用方法屬性。You can add controls to the by using the method of the property. > [!NOTE] > 只有內所包含的控制項控制項可以選取或接收焦點。Only controls that are contained within the control can be selected or receive focus. 完整本身無法選取或接收焦點。The complete itself cannot be selected or receive focus. 如需有關此控制項如何回應並方法，請參閱下列成員： ， ， ， ， ， .For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . 無法顯示的捲軸。The cannot display a scroll bar. 如果您需要控制類似於，可以包含捲軸，請參閱控制項。If you need a control similar to a that can contain a scroll bar, see the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會具現化，並建立並將兩個控制項。The following code example instantiates and creates a and two controls. 選項按鈕加入群組方塊和 [群組] 中會新增至。The radio buttons are added to the group box and the group box is added to the . [!code-csharp[Classic GroupBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic GroupBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic GroupBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic GroupBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，屬性設定為`false`新建立。By default, the property is set to `false` when a new is created. 群組方塊中含有 100 像素的初始高度和寬度為 200 像素。The group box has an initial height of 100 pixels and width of 200 pixels. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會具現化，並建立並將兩個控制項。The following code example instantiates and creates a and two controls. 選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕） 會新增至群組 方塊中，並加入群組方塊。The option buttons (also known as radio buttons) are added to the group box, and the group box is added to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`GroupBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `GroupBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值，決定是否要使用類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 或類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text

value.span: 如果類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版中的相容性的文字呈現。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性要提供視覺化的相容性，Windows Form 控制項之間呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂的文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式不從正在升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或是[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中導入[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了改善效能，讓文字看起來好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，則[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字呈現。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距] 和 [自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容情況，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性設`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`要`true`針對應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫方法的參數`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.
